name: Stress Sim
description:
~ Controls ~ 

Enter - New test

Enter - Continue text

Left click (when over pens) - Swap pen

Left click (when over paper) - final grade

 ~ About The Game ~

This game was made by a group of 8th graders to give a big thanks to a particularly tall man with a shaved head,  If you happen to be the big C himself the we want to give a massive thanks to you. You made this hectic 8th year some of the most funny and enjoyable moments of our lives.

_____________________________________________________

This game was made in just 20 days and may still continue to be in development who know, i dont

~ Credits ~

Coding everything and anything (except drawing) - Mark
